1.title: Morels
1.plot: In the stark ruins of a remote forest fire, morel mushrooms sprout in the ashes. Watch their journey across thousands of miles from forest to feast.

2.title: Asparagus
2.plot: From seed to stalk, from farm to table - watch the passionate story of how organic asparagus travels from a family farm in Ontario to a backyard BBQ.

3.title: Cranberries
3.plot: Millions of pounds of cranberries start their global journey from a Nova Scotia farm. Watch one batch make their way from field to Thanksgiving feast.

4.title: Spot Prawns
4.plot: From the cool clear blue waters of Vancouver to a beach-side grill, watch the harrowing journey of a highly sought-after spot prawn.

imdb.plot outline: Food ingredients often take incredible and surprising journeys to get from harvest to plate. This fast-paced beautifully-shot 4k series takes you to meet the people whose lives are shaped by the food we grow, sell and eat. From wild morel mushrooms to sweet spot prawns, this is a must-see program for food lovers.
imdb.title: Crate to Plate
plot: Food ingredients often take incredible and surprising journeys to get from harvest to plate.
